    • Method Detail

      • createRooms

        public void createRooms()
        creates the rooms objects and adds the values to the list

      • saveClientData

        public void saveClientData()
        saves client data into the clients.xml file. clients array list is loaded from the file at the start, and if updated during the lifetime of the program this method also updates the data in the file with the new values from the list. method is using the DocumentBuilderFactory to create and manage the file connection, nodes and elements

      • loadClientData

        public void loadClientData()
        loads client data from the clients.xml file. method is using the DocumentBuilderFactory to create and manage the file connection, nodes and elements data elements are loaded using the for loop and added to the array of clients.

      • saveBookingData

        public void saveBookingData()
        saves booking data into the booking.xml file. saves all the data from the list of bookings into the file

      • loadBookingData

        public void loadBookingData()
        loads booking data from the booking.xml file. method is using the DocumentBuilderFactory to create and manage the file connection, nodes and elements loads the data from the file and populates the list with the elements

        Parameters:
        givenName - given name of the client
        familyName - family name of the client
        email -
        phone -

      • addBooking

        public void addBooking(java.lang.String email,
                       java.time.LocalDateTime time,
                       int duration,
                       int reference,
                       int roomBooked)
        Parameters:
        email - - client email
        time - - date and time of the booking start
        duration - - duration of the booking
        reference - - reference number
        roomBooked - - romm number the booking is relating to

      • displayClients

        public void displayClients()
        for each loop displaying all the elements in the client list

      • findBooking

        public void findBooking(int bookingRef)
        Parameters:
        bookingRef - displays the booking data based on the booking reference

      • findClient

        public int findClient(java.lang.String email)
        Parameters:
        email - email of the client
        Returns:
        the index of the client which can be later use to recover the data of the client from the list if the index is < 0 it will fail the validation later on in the Main class

      • cancelBooking

        public void cancelBooking(int reference)
        Parameters:
        reference - reference number of the booking removes the booking from the list based on the reference value later updates the data in the file

      • listBookings

        public void listBookings(java.time.LocalDateTime date)
        Parameters:
        date - - date of the booking start this method is displaying which rooms are booked for the specific date

      • getBookingRef

        public int getBookingRef()
        Returns:
        the booking reference number which is used later to increment the booking ref in the file

      • displayReport

        public void displayReport(java.lang.String email)
        Parameters:
        email - - used to display the report for the specific user
